<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81430</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81430</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4785</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sonnet Metre and Rhyme Exercise</string>
            <string language="es">Ejercicio de métrica y rimas en sonetos</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht Meadrachta agus Ríme Soinéid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonett-Meßinstrument und Reim-Übung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mètre de sonnet et exercice de rime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medidor de Sonnet e exercício da rima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tester di Sonnet ed esercitazione di rima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέτρο σονέτων και άσκηση έμμετρου λόγου</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Exercise requiring students to mark the rhyme scheme and metre in a Shakespearean sonnet.</string>
            <string language="es">Ejercicio que requiere que los estudiantes marquen el esquema de la rima y la métrica en un soneto de Shakespeare.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht ina gcaitheann daltaí scéim ríme agus meadracht i soinéad Shakespearach a mharcáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Poesía. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Poetry</string>
            <string language="ga">Filíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trainieren Sie, Kursteilnehmer benötigend, den 
Reimentwurf und -meßinstrument in einem Shakespearean Sonett 
zu kennzeichnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercez-vous en exigeant des étudiants de 
marquer l'arrangement et le mètre de rime dans un sonnet de 
Shakespearean.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercite requerendo estudantes marcar o esquema e
o medidor da rima em um sonnet de Shakespearean.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitisi richiedendo agli allievi di 
contrassegnare lo schema ed il tester di rima in un sonnet di 
Shakespearean.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκηση που απαιτεί τους σπουδαστές για να χαρακτηρίσει
το σχέδιο και το μέτρο έμμετρου λόγου σε ένα σονέτο 
Shakespearean.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
